participant_1.background:
I stay away from clowns and eat my favorite blue jello.
I enjoy racing go karts and driving my classic car.
My pets are always there to listen to me when I need to vent my feelings.
I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
i enjoy cooking and baking.

participant_2.background:
I listen to audiobooks and podcasts to educate myself and pass the time.
My first purchase was a bike, so I could enjoy the woods on my own terms.
i keep my hair cut very short.
i m looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
i like italian cousine.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing this fine day?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just relaxing with some audiobooks and podcasts.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I'm currently in the kitchen, baking some cookies.
Ooh, I love baking! What kind of cookies are you making?
Chocolate chip cookies. They're my favorite!
Mine too! I could eat chocolate chip cookies all day long.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
I'm sure we have a lot more in common. I love to go for bike rides in the woods. Do you like to bike?
I love to bike! I used to bike all the time when I was younger. I haven't had a bike in a while, though.
You should get a bike again! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about biking.
Me too! I love talking about biking and baking.
We should do this again sometime. I'd love to learn more about your baking skills.
